banner.text: An official website of the United States government
banner.aria_label: Official website of the United States government

domain.heading: Official websites use .gov
domain.text: A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.

https.heading: Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
https.posttext: or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.
